entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
